JobFullDesc: Are you up to the challenge of being a trusted business advisor with an opportunity to influence business strategy at one the world's leading professional services firms? creating outlines for story development; assisting with orals planning, scripting, and coaching; developing and communicating rehearsal schedules and logistics; preparing teams for orals delivery and Q&A sessions; and facilitating the orals debrief sessions and post-orals strategyContribute to developing Deloitte's Consulting pursuit team including collaborating and coaching other pursuit team members, refining and improving pursuit strategies, and acting as a project-by-project liaison between our team and the broader firmQualifications  Required  Bachelor's degree in communications, business/marketing, humanities, or related disciplines, with advanced degree preferre  15+ years of relevant experience in business-to-business communications and/or strategic marketing communications directed to Fortune 500 organizations;
